```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# read in data
ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = ethnicity))
```
